title: 'Thong Song' Gone Wrong
teaser: You've never heard the notorious 2000 hit "Thong Song" quite like this. We've rewritten the lyrics to be about other things that rhyme with "thong"...tha thong thong thong.
contentencoded:
You've never heard Sisqo's notorious 2000 hit "Thong Song" quite like this. We've rewritten the lyrics to be about other things that rhyme with "thong"...tha thong thong thong.

Heard in Episode 324: His Dark Material
